unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Binomial Distribution: Manipulating the Binomial Formula
question_text: A random variable $X$ has the probability $$\begin{pmatrix} 20 \\ k \end{pmatrix}(0.44)^{k}(0.56)^{20-k}$$ ...associated with the value $k$ for $k= 0,1,2,3,â€¦,20$ . What is the mean of $X$ ?
